reviewText: Elton Chong plays the part of a young willing student, trying to find a way to avenge the death of his one time teacher. After being beaten  multiple times by multiple gangs, fate brings him to an old pot bellied  begger, who decides to take him on as a student, in hopes that he may be  able to regain the precious martial arts books that had been stolen by an  evil trio of masters.  Strenuous training finally pays off when he finally  masters the art and secrets behind the invincible snake technique.  The  only thing left is to retreive the book, and take revenge.
